reviewText: This video is great for suggesting where you might want to visit and what you might want to see, as well as reminding you when you get back of what you experienced.
Our family enjoys watching this DVD for the great bird and animal footage.  There are also many interesting facts presented about the various national parks/areas, and the animals and birds too.

This video is a lot of fun.
Shows tons of animals native to Florida and chronicles their behaviors and habitat.
Lots of alligator close-ups and informative about bird calls too. Captures footage of some of the rarer creatures in the area as well.
Highly recommended.
